rules_text:
Distribute four +1/+1 counters among up to four target creatures.
Suspend 4–{G} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
notes:
Art: Yes (Low rez image, use original)

RG Suspend, Noncreature
